      • addChild

        public org.primefaces.model.TreeNode addChild(org.primefaces.model.TreeNode parent,
                                     Long id,
                                     String label,
                                     String concept)
        Parameters:
        parent - The node of the parent
        id - The identifier of the underlying domain bean (so that we can, for example, save the label if the user modifies it)
        label - The text displayed by the node
        concept - Allows different kinds of <p:treeNode> using the "type" attribute (e.g. <p:treeNode type="Answer">)
        Returns:
        the node that the method created
